content.text: It's going good! Just got back from the park with my kids.
Aww, that's nice. I'm in the process of training my dog so we can go on longer hikes together.
Oh that's awesome! What kind of dog do you have?
He's a golden retriever named Buddy. He's a big puppy, but he's so sweet.
I love golden retrievers! They're so friendly. I have a cat named Mittens.
Aww, cats are great too! I'm jealous you get to stay at home with your kids. I'm a student and I work part-time so I don't get to see them as much as I'd like.
I know the feeling. I wish I could spend more time working, but I love being at home with my kids.
I'm sure they love having you home too. What's your favorite thing about being a stay at home mom?
I love being able to be there for them and watch them grow up. It's amazing to see how much they learn and change every day.
That sounds amazing. I'm sure it's a lot of work, but it's worth it.
It is! I wouldn't trade it for anything
